data.text: Is Fedramp-Certified Mainframes the playbook for tens of thousands of residents in West Virginia still affected by a disastrous Vaccine Passport System failure? This Assistant Service Director thinks so. That's #GovTechInnovation with @BREAKINGGOVTECH.

Florida Governor Ron DeSantis (R), along with the state attorneys general for West Virginia and Louisiana, pledged to investigate GoFundMe's removal of a page raising money for the Canadian protests against vaccine mandates.
